SELECT t1.ID_, t1.CATEGORY_, t1.NAME_, t1.KEY_, t1.VERSION_, t1.RESOURCE_NAME_, t1.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_, t1.SUSPENSION_STATE_, t1.DEPLOYMENT_ID_, t2.DEPLOY_TIME_ FROM act_re_procdef t1 LEFT JOIN act_re_deployment t2 ON t1.DEPLOYMENT_ID_=t2.ID_
JOIN (SELECT KEY_, MAX(VERSION_) VERSION FROM act_re_procdef GROUP BY KEY_) t3 ON t3.KEY_=t1.KEY_ and t3.VERSION=t1.VERSION_

select count(1) from act_re_procdef t1
JOIN (SELECT KEY_, MAX(VERSION_) VERSION FROM act_re_procdef GROUP BY KEY_) t3 ON t3.KEY_=t1.KEY_ and t3.VERSION=t1.VERSION_
